isis.stitle: HEAT VENTILATION AIR CONDITIONING (HVAC), Thermostatic Expansion Valve (TXV) System, March 2007 and Later - SPECIAL TOOLS - REFRIGERANT IDENTIFIER

svcproc.title: REFRIGERANT IDENTIFIER
svcproc.para: In today's environment there are a lot of alternative and blended refrigerants; International only recognizes R-134a for this A/C system. The only way to know for sure if you can safely recover the refrigerant in an A/C system is through the use of a refrigerant identifier (refer to Figure 57). The refrigerant identifier (ZTSE4616) samples the refrigerant; then displays the type and purity of the refrigerant in the system. The refrigerant identifier is supplied as part of a kit which includes the necessary hoses and fittings.

caution.para: When red spots or discoloration begins to appear on the white outside diameter of the filter element, THE FILTER MUST BE REPLACED. Failure to properly maintain the sample filter may result in severe instrument damage that is not covered under warranty repairs.
